name: Summer Program
description: Summer classes provide students with a relaxed and enjoyable learning environment, making this scorching summer more fulfilling, healthy, happy, and meaningful. The teaching style of summer classes are diverse, with quiet activities and a combination of work and rest, which are highly welcomed by parents and students. Classes in Chinese Calligraphy, Fine Arts, Chinese Kong Fu/PE, etc. It will add new elements to this year's summer classes, bringing greater vitality.

howToGetIt: The program is currently enrolling students in elementary to middle school (K-8th grade). Please apply at Nam Kue School (755 Sacramento St). Only accept checks, please make checks payable to: Nam Kue School.
